name: Tharindu Kaushal
bio: Paskuwal Handi Tharindu Kaushal (Sinhala: තරිදු කෞශාල්; born 5 March 1993) is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer who plays for ODIs and Tests in international level. He is a right-arm off break bowler who also bats right-handed.[1] He is a past student of Devapathiraja College, Rathgama.
